attributes.action: Impose a ban on loud fireworks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be a ban on loud fireworks because of the enviroment issues that arise from these, we have to take in to effect what these loud fireworks have on  People ( especailly the elderly who think they are back in war times ), Pets, we are advised to keep pets indoors but even with the TV volume up, the fireworks make such a loud bang, you have to be deafend by the volume of the TV just to drown these out, also you have the people that are in animal fancies, where they breed to exibit them, wether it be Guinea Pigs, Rabbits or Birds, these are usually kept in sheds in purpose built hutches/pens and with the quantity and the design of accomadation just cannot be taken indoors, animals that are pregnant can easily miscarry due to these excessive bangs, and not forgetting the wildlife they must be scared witless. 
I am not saying ban all fireworks, just the ones that bang loud, why do we need to have loud ones, just ones that give off pretty lights is just as entertaining, so please sign
